description: woven ribbon in blue, light tan and dark tan in striped pattern, formed and stiffened to mimic ribbon wrapped and tied in a bow around a box
text: By packaging air, Sachiko Morino encourages viewers to contemplate the void, which is gift-wrapped for our attention by the encapsulating stiffened, woven ribbon. With no visible supports, Morino presents an eerie tension that may only be resolved through contemplation.
title: Untitled
